injectables.name: ApiService

methods.name: getFood
methods.rawdescription:
Fetches the details of a specific food item by its ID.

This method sends an HTTP GET request to the API endpoint to retrieve the details
of a food item identified by the provided `foodId`. The response is an observable
of type `FoodResponse`, which contains the food item details.

The method applies the following RxJS operators to the observable stream:

- `debounceTime(300)`: Delays the emission of the value by 300 milliseconds to prevent
  rapid successive requests, which is useful for scenarios like type-ahead search.

- `distinctUntilChanged()`: Ensures that the observable emits values only when the
  current value is different from the last emitted value. This helps in avoiding
  duplicate requests for the same food ID.

- `shareReplay({ bufferSize: 1, refCount: true })`: Shares the observable among multiple
  subscribers and replays the last emitted value to new subscribers. The `bufferSize: 1`
  ensures that only the latest value is cached, and `refCount: true` ensures that the
  observable is kept alive as long as there are subscribers.
methods.description:
Fetches the details of a specific food item by its ID.

This method sends an HTTP GET request to the API endpoint to retrieve the details of a food item identified by the provided foodId. The response is an observable of type FoodResponse, which contains the food item details.

The method applies the following RxJS operators to the observable stream:

  • debounceTime(300): Delays the emission of the value by 300 milliseconds to prevent rapid successive requests, which is useful for scenarios like type-ahead search.

  • distinctUntilChanged(): Ensures that the observable emits values only when the current value is different from the last emitted value. This helps in avoiding duplicate requests for the same food ID.

  • shareReplay({ bufferSize: 1, refCount: true }): Shares the observable among multiple subscribers and replays the last emitted value to new subscribers. The bufferSize: 1 ensures that only the latest value is cached, and refCount: true ensures that the observable is kept alive as long as there are subscribers.

jsdoctags.comment: • The unique identifier of the food item to be fetched.
An observable of type FoodResponse containing the details of the food item.

components.name: DeleteButtonsComponent
components.templateData:
@if (buttonStyle() === 'icon') {
  <button
    mat-icon-button
    (click)="deleteEvent.emit()"
    matTooltip="Delete food item"
    aria-label="Button that deletes food item when clicked"
  >
    <mat-icon>delete</mat-icon>
  </button>
} @else {
  <button
    mat-raised-button
    (click)="deleteEvent.emit()"
    aria-label="Button that deletes food item when clicked"
  >
    Delete <mat-icon class="app-mat-icon-scale-1">delete</mat-icon>
  </button>
}

components.name: LoginFormComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-card class="login-form">
  <mat-card-header>
    <mat-card-title>Login</mat-card-title>
  </mat-card-header>
  <mat-card-content>
    <!-- Login form -->
    <form [formGroup]="authForm">
      <mat-form-field appearance="fill">
        <mat-label>Email</mat-label>
        <input matInput formControlName="email" type="email" />
        @if (emailError) {
          <mat-error> Please enter a valid email address </mat-error>
        }
      </mat-form-field>
      <mat-form-field appearance="fill">
        <mat-label>Password</mat-label>
        <input
          matInput
          formControlName="password"
          [type]="pwdHide ? 'text' : 'password'"
        />
        @if (passwordError) {
          <mat-error> Password is required </mat-error>
        }
        <button
          mat-icon-button
          matSuffix
          (click)="pwdHide = !pwdHide"
          [attr.aria-label]="'Hide password'"
        >
          <mat-icon>{{ pwdHide ? 'visibility_off' : 'visibility' }}</mat-icon>
        </button>
      </mat-form-field>
    </form>
  </mat-card-content>
  <mat-card-actions>
    <button
      mat-raised-button
      color="primary"
      type="submit"
      (click)="onLogin()"
      (keypress)="onLogin()"
      [disabled]="!authForm.valid"
    >
    <mat-icon class="app-mat-icon-scale-1">login</mat-icon>Login
    </button>
  </mat-card-actions>
</mat-card>

components.name: SearchBarComponent
components.templateData:
<form class="search-form">
  <mat-form-field class="example-full-width">
    <mat-label>{{ inputLabelText() }}</mat-label>
    <input
      type="text"
      [placeholder]="inputPlaceholderText()"
      [attr.aria-label]="inputLabelText()"
      matInput
      [formControl]="foodControl"
      [matAutocomplete]="auto"
    />
    @if (foodControl.value) {
      <button matSuffix mat-icon-button aria-label="Clear" (click)="onClear()">
        <mat-icon>close</mat-icon>
      </button>
    }
    <mat-autocomplete autoActiveFirstOption #auto="matAutocomplete">
      @let options = filteredOptions$ | async;
      @for (option of options; track option) {
        <mat-option [value]="option.name">{{ option.name }}</mat-option>
      }
    </mat-autocomplete>
  </mat-form-field>
  <button
    (click)="getOption()"
    mat-flat-button
    aria-label="Food button"
    class="search-button"
    [disabled]="!isFormValid"
  >
    {{ buttonText() }}
    @if (buttonFunction() === 'add') {
      <mat-icon class="app-mat-icon-scale-1">add_circle_outline</mat-icon>
    } @else if (buttonFunction() === 'search') {
      <mat-icon class="app-mat-icon-scale-1">search</mat-icon>
    }
  </button>
</form>

components.name: SignupFormComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-card class="login-form">
  <mat-card-header>
    <mat-card-title>Sign Up</mat-card-title>
  </mat-card-header>
  <mat-card-content>
    <!-- Sign up form -->
    <form [formGroup]="authForm">
      <mat-form-field appearance="fill">
        <mat-label>Email</mat-label>
        <input matInput formControlName="email" type="email" />
        @if (emailError) {
          <mat-error> Please enter a valid email address </mat-error>
        }
      </mat-form-field>
      <mat-form-field appearance="fill">
        <mat-label>Password</mat-label>
        <input
          matInput
          formControlName="password"
          [type]="pwdHide ? 'text' : 'password'"
        />
        <button
          mat-icon-button
          matSuffix
          (click)="pwdHide = !pwdHide"
          [attr.aria-label]="'Hide password'"
        >
          <mat-icon>{{ pwdHide ? 'visibility_off' : 'visibility' }}</mat-icon>
        </button>
        @if (passwordError) {
          <mat-error>
            Require min. 8 characters including special character, number,
            uppercase
          </mat-error>
        }
      </mat-form-field>
      <mat-form-field appearance="fill">
        <mat-label>Confirm password</mat-label>
        <input
          matInput
          formControlName="confirmPassword"
          [type]="pwdHide ? 'text' : 'password'"
        />
        @if (confirmPasswordError) {
          <mat-error> Passwords are not matching </mat-error>
        }
      </mat-form-field>
    </form>
  </mat-card-content>
  <mat-card-actions>
    <button
      mat-raised-button
      color="primary"
      type="submit"
      (click)="onSignUp()"
      (keypress)="onSignUp()"
      [disabled]="!authForm.valid"
    >
      <mat-icon class="app-mat-icon-scale-1"> add_circle_outline </mat-icon> Sign Up
    </button>
  </mat-card-actions>
</mat-card>
